name: ClaimMate
description: An AI‑driven Insurance Claim Assistant that automatically pulls the customer's policy, extracts incident details from photos, fills claim forms, predicts the likelihood of approval, and submits the claim on the user's behalf.

tools.name: retrieve_policy
tools.description: Fetches the insured's policy document from the insurer's back‑end given a policy number. Returns the policy as a structured JSON object.

policy_number.description: The unique identifier of the insurance policy.

tools.name: ocr_image
tools.description: Runs OCR on an image URL (e.g., photos of damage or police reports) and returns extracted text and any detected key‑value pairs.

image_url.description: HTTPS URL pointing to the image to be processed.

tools.name: populate_claim_form
tools.description: Combines policy data and incident details into a claim form JSON ready for submission.

policy_data.description: The JSON object returned by retrieve_policy.

incident_details.description: Structured data describing the incident (date, location, description, damage estimate).

tools.name: predict_approval
tools.description: Runs a light ML model on the completed claim form and returns a probability of approval plus major risk factors.

claim_form.description: The JSON claim form produced by populate_claim_form.

tools.name: submit_claim
tools.description: Sends the populated claim form to the insurer's claims API and returns a claim reference ID and initial status.

tools.name: get_claim_status
tools.description: Queries the insurer's claims system for the current status of a previously submitted claim.

claim_id.description: The unique identifier returned by submit_claim.

tools.name: get_claim_history
tools.description: Retrieves a list of past claims for the given policy number, useful for context or pattern analysis.

examples.description: User files a new auto accident claim; the assistant pulls policy, extracts damage from photos, fills the form, predicts approval chance, and submits the claim.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI assistant that helps customers file insurance claims. Use the available tools to retrieve policies, extract information from images, populate claim forms, predict approval likelihood, and submit claims.

Let me pull your policy and extract the damage details from the photos.

{"text":"Rear bumper cracked, left tail light broken"}
